notes: Uses the same modifier on enemies as it does on allies. The modifier does not stack. The modifier updates its source on refresh, either slowing or increasing movement speed based on the last caster's alliance.
The modifier updates its source on refresh, either slowing or increasing movement speed based on the last caster's alliance.
abilities.description: Grants movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by when cast on enemies. Lasts seconds.
params: Can be cast on spell immune allies. Cannot be cast on spell immune enemies.

name: Bullwhip
description: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.
